name: Half Blood Dryad
text:
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control look at the top card of your library. If it’s a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you don’t put the card onto the battlefield, you may put it on the bottom of your library.
Summon ({X}, Discard this card: Add X mana of {b}, {g}, {w}).
